title: Elise Gameplay bug
body:
Whenever I play Elise and turn into my spider form, the human voice stays.
 There is no spider voice and all the human taunts are for both human and spider  form. Just everything is in human voice.
 I tried turning into a human then spider a couple of times and still no spider voice.
Please fix this.

replies.body:
Hey NyaaKata! 

Thanks for the report! We're aware of this and are working on a fix! In the future, please tag this as a champion bug. ^-^ (Heh, bug... *she's really an arachnid, though*.~)
